thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com | 3 of 166
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: Wonderful experience. My initial order arrived and was not what I had anticipated. I had thought I ordered transition tenting for when going from indoors to outdoors but when my glasses arrived, it had permanent tenting on the lenses. Obviously, this was not conducive for wearing them inside so I called SmartGlasses and they accepted them back and made a new pair to my liking at no extra charge and no questions asked. Only thing I had to pay was Return Shipping. My new glasses arrived quickly and the best part, I got the glasses I wanted at half the price I would have paid at Pearle Vision, Lens Crafters, etc. Thanks SmartGlasses!
